Detailed Description

A class that gets notification and can enforce conditions when the UI is closed.

This class provides an interface to receive notification that the main interface is about to close and can enforce certain conditions before the interface is closed, or can stop the interface from closing. This is useful, for example, to notify the user that unsaved data will be lost if the interface is closed.

Member Function Documentation

bool DzShutDownCheck::doCheck ( DzMainWindow *  mw  )  [pure virtual]

Called by the interface when closing to allow the check to perform last minute operations. This is only called if needCheck() returns true.

Returns:
true if the actions were performed and the application can close, false if the application should not close (i.e. the user cancelled).
bool DzShutDownCheck::needsCheck (  )  const [pure virtual]

Called by the interface to determine if this check needs to perform any actions before the application closes down.

Returns:
true if the check needs to perform actions - doCheck() will then be called to perform the actions. False if the check does not need to do anything.
